text:
Hey everyone – I previously created non-commercial open source tool called <http://github.com/AntonOsika/gpt-engineer|github.com/AntonOsika/gpt-engineer> that became very popular

Been iterating relentlessly on the right “form factor” for creating real web apps with a chat interface since then – and it seems like we nailed it now
(see quotes in thread)

If you’re in this community and curious, happy to give access – <http://producthunt.com|producthunt.com> today has more info and instructions for access
(or just comment)

We’re not running any “sponsored” product hunt stuff like most people so we’ll see how it goes :crossed_fingers:
